author: schoef
body:
#### PR description:

- Adding jetNDauCharged (number of charged tracks of jet associated with lepton) for electrons and muons in nanoAOD. This completes the list of input variables for various lepton MAV flavors and allows to evaluate them on nanoAOD.

- Added DQM plots

The variables amount to ~2.5 bytes/event, i.e. a 0.1% increase in the overall size as checked by @swertz 

Should be included in the next legacy and ultra-legacy nanoAOD production.

#### PR validation:

Tested in private top nanoAOD production

title: jetNDauChargedMVASel for nanoAOD electrons & muons for topMVA inputs
